headline: The Bull Case For Mosaic (MOS) Could Change Following Extended Brazil Phosphate Curtailments Amid Cost Pressures
summary: Mosaic recently extended its single superphosphate production curtailments at its Fospar and Araxá facilities in Brazil by 30 days, responding to sharply higher sulfur input costs and ongoing market assessment needs. This move, coming soon after the company flagged weaker Q4 2025 fertilizer demand and lower North American phosphate shipments, underscores how Mosaic is actively adjusting output to balance cost pressures with softer end-market conditions.
